data.oai_dc:dc: Data from Lishawa et al. LishawaEtalFieldData spreadsheet represents plot-level data from three-year field experiment including: identifiers, treatment, summary statistics, taxonomic and phylogenetic diversity metrics, and species-level plant cover data. LishawaEtalSeedData spreadsheet represents seed bank emergence experiment data including: identifiers, treatment, summary statistics, taxonomic and phylogenetic diversity metrics, and species-level stem count data. SpeciesNames spreadsheet provides binomials for the six-letter shorthand used in data files.
